personal.name: Front-End Developer
personal.title: Front-End Developer
personal.summary: Front-End Developer with 3.7+ years of experience in the IT industry, focused on creating scalable and high-performance web applications. Skilled in modern front-end technologies, including React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, and CMS platforms such as Storyblok. I am eager to join a team where I can apply my technical knowledge and attention to detail to build accessible, maintainable, and user-focused web solutions.

projects.name: E-commerce Web Application (Flight Booking Platform)
projects.description: Built Akasa Air's international flight booking web application
achievements: Contributed to a 30% increase in global booking traffic post-launch
Built the Dual Seat Booking (Extra Seat) feature, contributing to revenue increase
Delivered Travel Certificate functionality with Razorpay integration
Led Storyblok CMS integration for centralized content management
Created Interactive Network Map for direct flight booking
Introduce data privacy enhancements for group and series bookings, including validation checks during PNR retrieval in Manage Booking and Check-in flows.
Improved Google Lighthouse score from 70 to 90%
Replaced Material UI with optimized custom Tailwind components

projects.name: FNS (Flight Notification System) Web Application
projects.description: Full-featured Flight Notification System for real-time flight updates
achievements: Employed Redux-Saga for scalable state management
Developed robust search, sorting, and pagination functionality
Handled full CRUD operations for backend data management
Leveraged Next.js dynamic routing for scalable screen logic

projects.name: Learning Management Platform
achievements: Contributed to UI development using React.js, Redux, Bootstrap, and Material UI
Developed interactive learning module enhancing student engagement
Applied new application theme improving overall platform aesthetics
Integrated SendGrid API for automated email communication
Rebuilt shopping cart and course selection components
Revamped student view interface for better user experience
